text.div:
Meningococcal Disease (Tests for Neisseria meningitidis Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    49671-1 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    5029-4 Neisseria meningitidis rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    53606-0 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    6509-4 Neisseria meningitidis rRNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Probe
    71788-4 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74534-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Y DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74535-6 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup X DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    74537-2 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup C DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74538-0 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    74539-8 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    82185-0 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    85628-6 Neisseria meningitidis sodC gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85797-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup DNA panel - Unspecified specimen Qualitative by NAA with probe detection
    86198-9 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup Y synF gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86234-2 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup A sacB gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    86237-5 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup w135 synG gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86238-3 Neisseria meningitidis serogroup X xcbB gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91803-7 Neisseria meningitidis DNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
